overview: Nadia keeps a secret watch over friends and family. She is a voyeur, thriving on the silent observation of others, incapable of interaction. But she will soon have to face up to the reality of an unwanted pregnancy from a relationship that ended with the discovery of her partner's homosexuality. All will be revealed when a family arrives on the scene, the same family that fifteen years before, initiated Nadia in the art of observation.
title: Voyeur
